channel.title: Server issues please help
channel.description:
Today, I had some trouble with my internet and i had to restart it all. which i restarted my Linksys (used for port forwarding).
So, now i redo my port forwarding, by opening the comand box typing in ipconfig, and finding the digits for the port forwarding. so it would be ***.***.***.$$$ the money signs are the digits i need.
so i got to my browser type in 192.168.1.1, it leads me to my linksys page i type in my pass and user, it opens up i go to games and apps, type in that code. save, then close the browser.
now i open up compiler click "r" push "enter" then it says starting ____scape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 all this stuff is still normal.
i click on run moparscape then type in pass, user then my servers ip, it says "server must be down" so i make another server do the same thing and it says "server must be down" so i make one more it says "server must be down".
So how do i connect to my server, did i mess up in my linksys? did i do something wrong. if so please tell me, Im getting spammed saying put up ur server and i can't so wat the H377 do i do?
ALSO I TRIED EACH SERVER WITH A DIFFERENT SOURCE AND IT STILL SAYS "CANNOT CONNECT TO SERVER. IT MUST BE DOWN".[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 08:12:05 PM[/size][hr]?

item.title: Server issues please help
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Restart ur router.
Reboot ur computer.
Re-portforward.
If that doesnt work
Get a new router.
If that doesnt work.
Gl trying

Read full topic

item.title: Server issues please help
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

montalvom:

that happend to me i restarted my router then it worked but log in as local host and others can still play on your server

Are u the most stupidest person in the history of moparscapeians?
IF YOU LOG IN WITH LOCAL HOST…
AND PPL GO ON THE NO-IP.
YOU WONT BE ABLE TO SEE THEN OR SEE THEIR YELL MESSAGES…
Dont get him confused…
In 20 minutes he’ll post another thread about how to see people…

Read full topic

item.title: Server issues please help
item.dc:creator: @masta_toxik masta toxik
item.description:
@masta_toxik wrote:

Today, I had some trouble with my internet and i had to restart it all. which i restarted my Linksys (used for port forwarding).

So, now i redo my port forwarding, by opening the comand box typing in ipconfig, and finding the digits for the port forwarding. so it would be ***.***.***.$$$ the money signs are the digits i need.

so i got to my browser type in 192.168.1.1, it leads me to my linksys page i type in my pass and user, it opens up i go to games and apps, type in that code. save, then close the browser.

now i open up compiler click “r” push “enter” then it says starting ____scape server on 0.0.0.0:43594 all this stuff is still normal.

i click on run moparscape then type in pass, user then my servers ip, it says “server must be down” so i make another server do the same thing and it says “server must be down” so i make one more it says “server must be down”.

So how do i connect to my server, did i mess up in my linksys? did i do something wrong. if so please tell me, Im getting spammed saying put up ur server and i can’t so wat the H377 do i do?

ALSO I TRIED EACH SERVER WITH A DIFFERENT SOURCE AND IT STILL SAYS “CANNOT CONNECT TO SERVER. IT MUST BE DOWN”.[br][size=1]Posted on: August 02, 2007, 08:12:05 PM[/size][hr]?
